statements: SELECT * FROM medication_prescription_trends
SELECT medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_prescription_trends WHERE patient_id = 123
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM medication_prescription_trends WHERE prescribing_physician = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT * FROM medication_prescription_trends WHERE medication_name LIKE '%acetaminophen%' ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS avg_patient_id FROM medication_prescription_trends
SELECT * FROM medication_prescription_trends WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_prescription_trends WHERE prescribing_physician = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(prescription_date) AS latest_prescription_date, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_prescriptions FROM medication_prescription_trends;
SELECT DISTINCT prescribing_physician FROM medication_prescription_trends ORDER BY prescribing_physician ASC;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM medication_prescription_trends GROUP BY medication_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_prescriptions DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT medication_name, prescription_count FROM prescription_records WHERE prescription_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, patient_id, medication_name FROM prescription_records WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT intervention_description FROM policy_interventions WHERE intervention_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY intervention_date ASC;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_description FROM policy_interventions WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM prescription_records WHERE prescription_count > 10 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM prescription_records JOIN policy_interventions ON prescription_records.patient_id = policy_interventions.id;
SELECT COUNT(id), medication_name, prescription_date FROM prescription_records GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, prescription_count FROM prescription_records WHERE patient_id = 123 AND prescription_count < 5;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_description FROM policy_interventions WHERE intervention_date >= '2022-01-01' AND intervention_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM prescription_doctors ORDER BY specialty, doctor_name;
SELECT * FROM policy_interventions WHERE intervention_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT prescription_doctors.doctor_name, medication_prescriptions.medication_name FROM prescription_doctors JOIN medication_prescriptions ON prescription_doctors.prescription_id = medication_prescriptions.prescription_id WHERE prescription_doctors.specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT prescription_id, doctor_name FROM prescription_doctors WHERE prescription_id IN (SELECT prescription_id FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM policy_interventions WHERE intervention_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, intervention_id FROM prescription_history ORDER BY history_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage < 25 AND prescription_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_prescriptions JOIN patient_demographics ON medication_prescriptions.patient_id = patient_demographics.patient_id WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT * FROM prescription_history JOIN policy_interventions ON prescription_history.intervention_id = policy_interventions.intervention_id WHERE policy_interventions.start_date < '2022-03-01' AND prescription_history.history_date > '2022-02-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, address FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC, gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, address FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer, purpose FROM medications WHERE medication_id < 5;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, hospital_name FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, hospital_name FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer, purpose FROM medications WHERE purpose LIKE '%pain%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
